name: Car Go Fast HD
description:
Update log

1.01- added full screen switching

1.02- fixed a bug on death, added better indication of the skin switcher

1.03- fixed another bug on death, fixed skin switcher

DESCRIPTION

Car Go Fast HD is the amazing, long awaited HD remaster of the hit game "Car Go Fast" that was made for LD48. This version of the game has upgraded visuals, gameplay, and music.

There are 11 skins to select from

MUSIC LORE //by ISTAREINURSOL

After a recent trip to Vietnam the car has just ran out of gas so to avoid paying the government for gas money the car decides to convert to electricity as it’s locomotion medium, furiously Joe Biden decides to send the IRS to the car to eliminate it swiftly, so the car has to go into maximum overdrive mode to outrun the IRS. However, this takes a toll on the car’s power levels so the car has to collect batteries on what seems to be an infinite road trip to the safe house where the car can spend its time without worrying about the IRS. 

After some relaxation time in the safe house, the car ends up upgrading itself with a strafing ability at the sacrifice of acceleration and deceleration which leaves some room for the ability to dash, although that also comes at a price for its Super Extreme Mega Exothermic Nitro system or S.E.M.E.N system for short only has a small amount of power dedicated to it for the car to strafe side to side faster than usual, right after developing the S.E.M.E.N system The IRS discovers the location of the safe house where the car is located once again, so the car is back on the run with it’s newly acquired S.E.M.E.N system the car starts its operation to flee from the IRS once again.
